Package index

All functions

annotate_by_clone()
Annotate clone IDs with reference table metadata
assign_clonotype()
Assign clonotypes from raw VDJ contig data
assign_clonotype_from_reference()
Assign clonotypes by mapping to a reference table
clonotype_summary()
Summarize clonotype changes across stringency levels
generate_test_VDJ()
Generate synthetic VDJ contig data for testing
identify_clonotypes()
Identify clonotypes at multiple stringency levels
map_clone_id()
Map clone IDs from VDJigsaw results to wide-format data
map_clonotypes_to_paired_TCR()
Map clonotypes from allele format to paired TCR format
pivot_VDJ()
Pivot VDJ contig data to wide format
plot_clone_composition()
Plot clonotype chain composition
plot_clonotype_flow()
Plot clonotype flow across stringency levels
plot_stringency_summary()
Plot clonotype assignment summary across stringency levels
validate_TCR()
Validate and correct TCR chain data
